attributes.action: Ensure that Ordnance Survey mark Pie Shops on all of their maps.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is vital that all OS Map users eat, and as food shops are currently not marked it can sometimes be difficult for people to fins what they need. I therefore petition that the UK's National Foodstuff - PIE, be included on all future OS maps.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
